text: "Fastest Girl in Town" is a song co-written and recorded by American country music artist Miranda Lambert. It was released in June 2012 as the third single from Lambert's album Four the Record. ==Music video== The music video for "Fastest Girl in Town" was shot in late June 2012, and features a guest appearance by NASCAR driver Danica Patrick. The video debuted at number 19 on CMT's Top 20 Countdown for the week of August 10, 2012. The music video reached number 1 on CMT's Top Twenty Countdown for the week of December 7, 2012. ==References== Category:2011 songs Category:Country rock songs Category:Music videos directed by Trey Fanjoy
title: Fastest Girl in Town
